title: SJB to boycott APC
body_lines: Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) has decided to boycott the All Party Conference (APC) called by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa, SJB National Organizer Tissa Attanayake told Daily Mirror today.
“SJB parliamentary group decided to boycott the APC as we feel it is only a media gimmick which will not bring any fruitful result,” he said.
“This government had been a failure and we don’t expect it to come up with anything useful through the APC,” he added.
Attanayake said SJB leader and Leader of the Opposition Sajith Premadasa will make a statement in Parliament today with regard to the decision made by the party to boycott the APC.
SJB will be the second opposition party to boycott the APC followed by the Jathika Jana Balawegaya. (Yohan Perera)
